method.name: GET
method.id: Get a list of known container deployment's metadata documents.
method.doc: Get a list of all the known the metadata document for managed containers.
Warning: This API does not function without installing the Verify Identity Access Container Extension from the IBM Security App Exchange.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: metadataGetJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: default
param.doc: Default Container Image to use with this deployment.

param.name: volumes
param.doc: Volume mount configuration for hosted container.

param.name: repo
param.doc: Container repository image is pulled from.

param.name: internal
param.doc: Port on container that this property maps to.

param.name: mountpoint
param.doc: Path on container that volume is mounted to.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
